thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 60 of 528
thread.title: quart

author: quart
title: quart
text: I love this company and the clothing! Each month they have new outfits, designs, and combinations, members are given 5 days to decide if they want to pick an outfit or skip the designs of that month. I only give 4 stars because sometimes they run out of sizes if you purchase outside the 5 days. However, If you do get something that doesn't fit the return policy is made easy.
